name: Fairy Carrots
description:
・Distribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.
・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

When using a gamepad

・If you click outside of the menu using the mouse, you will no longer be able to operate the menu using only the controller. To restore the ability to operate the menu with the controller, you will need to operate the menu using the mouse only once.
・The default settings for the camera speed are set for gamepad use. If you wish to change the camera speed or other settings, set the desired values from the settings screen.

When using a keyboard and mouse

・The default camera speed settings are intended for use with a gamepad. If you are using a mouse, we recommend that you set the camera speed near the minimum value from the settings screen.
